short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Noturna: enhances browsing for low vision users with high-contrast black backgrounds & white text/elements for easy navigation.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Introducing Noturna, the ultimate Chrome Extension for low vision users! ðŸš€ Transform your web browsing experience and discover a world of accessibility like never before. ðŸŒŽ

With Noturna, gone are the days of struggling to read text or navigate through websites. We've crafted a unique solution that automatically converts HTML backgrounds to a sleek, stylish black while turning text and foreground elements to a crisp, clean white. The result? A stunning high-contrast viewing experience that caters to your needs and enhances your browsing journey.
